title: const bindings don't appear in debug info
body:
Consider the following

```rust
use std::env;
use std::process::exit;

const C: usize = 2;
static S: usize = 2;

fn main() {
    exit((env::args().count() * C + S) as _);
}
```

The DWARF produced for this looks like

```
< 1><0x0000002a GOFF=0x000057e4>    DW_TAG_namespace
                                      DW_AT_name                  rust_scratch
< 2><0x0000002f GOFF=0x000057e9>      DW_TAG_variable
                                        DW_AT_name                  S
                                        DW_AT_type                  <0x00000063 GOFF=0x0000581d>
                                        DW_AT_decl_file             0x00000001 /home/khuey/dev/scratch/rust-scratch/src/main.rs
                                        DW_AT_decl_line             0x00000005
                                        DW_AT_alignment             0x00000001
                                        DW_AT_location              len 0x0009: 030000000000000000: DW_OP_addr 0x00000000
                                        DW_AT_linkage_name          _ZN12rust_scratch1S17h3d6a939dfb401814E
< 2><0x00000049 GOFF=0x00005803>      DW_TAG_subprogram
                                        DW_AT_low_pc                0x00009020
                                        DW_AT_high_pc               <offset-from-lowpc>154
                                        DW_AT_frame_base            len 0x0001: 57: DW_OP_reg7
                                        DW_AT_linkage_name          _ZN12rust_scratch4main17hf06deefdac6d13dcE
                                        DW_AT_name                  main
                                        DW_AT_decl_file             0x00000001 /home/khuey/dev/scratch/rust-scratch/src/main.rs
                                        DW_AT_decl_line             0x00000007
                                        DW_AT_main_subprogram       yes(1)
< 1><0x00000063 GOFF=0x0000581d>    DW_TAG_base_type
                                      DW_AT_name                  usize
                                      DW_AT_encoding              DW_ATE_unsigned
                                      DW_AT_byte_size             0x00000008
```

The output for the static binding comes from `codegen_static` on `CodegenCx`. consts, however, get tossed much earlier and don't appear as `MonoItem`s so they can't be output at this stage. One possible solution here is to create a `MonoItem` for consts that's used solely to output debug info.
